channel.title: Player VS Player system
channel.description:
Hi mopar, i'm in the search of some help since i tried multiple sources and there's always something with the PVP fucked up. i would really want someone to come help me on teamviewer if it's possible. it's not for leaching since it's just for me n my irl friends, but the PVP system aint working since things just won't hit on eachother. please help, Reply here back and we can figure something out in PM :)
thank you
-Matt
*EDIT* PI, Source RESPAWNPK.

item.title: Player VS Player system
item.dc:creator: @random_dude4 random dude4
item.description:
@random_dude4 wrote:

tried redoing it, changing all the different values on the things, nothing really changed. maybe it was just my mistake changing the wrong things, but i really do not know. sorry for this. :\

Edit*
Changed again, chars stood for 5 min now and havn’t killed eachother yet. they started at 50 HP.

Read full topic

item.title: Player VS Player system
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“random dude4, post:11, topic:426862”]the accuracy. it never hits. bonus’es and specials are fine on NPC’s it’s just versus other players. actually everything is fine on npcs. it’s just in PVP that we can’t hit.
i’m not the best to spot the places in the txt. files. so help would he appriciated

  • Matt[/quote]
    As stated above, redo the combat formula voids, e.g calculateMeleeMaxHit(), calculateMeleeAttack(), calculateMeleeDefence().

Have fun.

Read full topic

item.title: Player VS Player system
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

What exactly is “fucked up?” The accuracy? The max hits? The stats? The bonuses? There are a lot of factors concerning the PVP system.

Read full topic

item.title: Player VS Player system
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

PVP fucked up? so you want to improve your combat algorithms, your gonna have to look around.

-CombatAssistant
-Player.java
-Client.java blah blah.

Write your own formulas… list goes on

Read full topic

Roger that, but one thing. in what file would i find it. that’s the problem, in what file would this be so i could modify it. Could anyone tell me this please?

item.description:

Hate to say this but no one is going to do the work for, you must do the coding and if you have problems with the code like errors or its still not functioning right, post the code on here. Then you might receive the help

item.title: Player VS Player system
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“random dude4, post:3, topic:426862”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=529560.msg3864973#msg3864973 date=1324938241]
This isn’t the requests section. I’m not going to use T.V. to find a source for you. There’s always going to be a problem with PvP unless you can actually program.

Protip: There’s no requests section.
[/quote]

That’s not what i said sir. i’m not in need of a new source, i got one. it’s just the pvp system so if someone could help me with the pvp system, just so we could hit on eachother. i would be gratefull. if someone could help me with that, i could learn it myself and there would be no more problems.[/quote]

I suppose not now that you’ve edited it.

Read full topic
